actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-503, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 956. Upon the adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider the conference report on H.R. 956. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 203.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 173 (Roll no. 108).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 956) to establish legal standards and procedures for product liability litigation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 956 (product liability litigation).

titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 956) to establish legal standards and procedures for product liability litigation, and for other purposes.
